headline: Broadridge Acquires iJoin to Enhance Retirement Plan Technology Solutions
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. (NYSE:BR) is one of the best IT stocks to invest in according to hedge funds. On September 9, Broadridge Financial Solutions announced the acquisition of iJoin. iJoin is a retirement plan technology provider that specializes in solutions for participants’ onboarding, engagement, and analytics. The acquisition is intended to combine Broadridge’s existing […]
